name: FootballPoolPro
description:
FootballPool Pro contains all of the AFC and NFC National Football league teams, perfect for creating a friendly pool. Select your favorite team and their opponent, enter friends names, and everyone selects the squares that they want. Then sit back and enjoy the game. Each time one of the teams scores you can enter the latest score for that quarter to see which squares are winners. The final score for each quarter is used to select the winners and all results can be viewed via the options menu.

Features:
- Email pool data to all players.
- Maintains season long total score for all players.
- Unlimited number of pools can be created and maintained.
- Enter different cost/square for each pool.
- Once a pool is setup it can be locked so it cannot be changed.
- Includes all Pro Football teams.
- Allows unlimited players to be selected from your contacts list.
- Shows instantaneous winners when scores are entered.
- Displays points for each quarter and the winning square.
- Winning squares are highlighted on main screen.
- All data is retained when app is closed and reopened.
